title: Poster, 1995
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Night scene in incandescent-light-bulb orange, blue, green, and black. A man in sunglasses in upper left points a gun; another man in lower right nervously looks over his shoulder. In lower center: a man holding a gun in each hand, a woman's face obscured in long hair. Vertical Chinese text at left, vertical English text in center: "fallen angels" and "a film by Wong Kar-Wai." Text in Chinese upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1995.
1995. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-3.
